snippet: Sprint Nextel may have designs on the struggling cellphone network operator Clearwire, but a minority investor in Clearwire is calling on the company to remember its smaller shareholders.
abstract: Sprint Nextel may have designs on the struggling cellphone network operator Clearwire, but a minority investor in Clearwire is calling on the company to remember its smaller shareholders.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Clearwire Investor Demands Sale of Spectrum
